Red Sea attacks unlikely to hit French cereals exports to Asia for now - FranceAgriMerAttacks on ships in the Red Sea are unlikely for now to affect exports of French cereals to Asia, notably China which is a key market for France, since they are targeted at ships going towards Israel, farm office FranceAgriMer on Wednesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 15:51:21 GMT IQPYILXEDRIXPI77U47X7I7I34 https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/red-sea-attacks-unlikely-hit-french-cereals-exports-asia-now-franceagrimer-2024-01-17/Reuters市场商品
Higher penalties coming for export control violations -US Commerce officialThe Biden administration will crack down on companies that violate U.S. export rules, with stiffer penalties to deter future violations, a Department of Commerce (DOC) official said late on Tuesday. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 15:39:36 GMT 2NM6WXX25NLPXGFBNO7LGACN2E https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/higher-penalties-coming-export-control-violations-us-commerce-official-2024-01-17/Karen Freifeld市场美国市场
Taiwan reports first major post-election Chinese military activityTaiwan's defence ministry said it had detected on Wednesday evening 18 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships, the first large-scale post-election military activity. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 14:33:15 GMT UP2DHH3PFBNY7KWILLOUK6KOJA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-first-major-post-election-chinese-military-activity-2024-01-17/Reuters世界亚太地区
OneD, Koch Modular partner to scale up silicon-graphite EV anode materialsOneD Battery Sciences and Koch Modular said on Wednesday they have teamed up to build a factory in North America to produce enough silicon-graphite anode material to supply batteries for around 1 million EVs annually. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 14:03:29 GMT V3CGSGZTQ5JJ5HAIYEQYZ4WBWY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/oned-koch-modular-partner-scale-up-silicon-graphite-ev-anode-materials-2024-01-17/Nick Carey商业汽车与交通
On visit to Ireland, Chinese premier eyes deeper economic tiesChina would like to deepen economic and trade cooperation with Ireland, particularly in areas of "huge potential" such as green technologies and the digital economy, Premier Li Qiang said on Wednesday during a trip to Dublin. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 13:36:51 GMT 3OE4EZDEAVPC7HDXYM3JPGMDYE https://www.reuters.com/world/visit-ireland-chinese-premier-eyes-deeper-economic-ties-2024-01-17/Reuters世界
India rejects iron ore miner NMDC's proposal for China exports -sourcesIndia's government has turned down a request from state-owned iron ore miner NMDC Ltd to export its ore to China, the world's largest iron ore consumer, three sources with direct knowledge said. Wed, 17 Jan 2024 12:35:16 GMT ASZ35CQXR5OFLHMRR2NZDLQDTM https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/india-rejects-iron-ore-miner-nmdcs-proposal-china-exports-sources-2024-01-17/Neha Arora市场商品
